document.full_text: dr. tshabalala-msimang questioned the causal connection between h.i.v. and aids and promoted dietary measures rather than drug treatments.
document.title: manto tshabalala-msimang, south african who oversaw discredited aids policy, dies at 69
lines_and_colors: dr. tshabalala-msimang questioned the causal connection between h.i.v. and aids and promoted dietary measures rather than drug treatments.
